1.<if_woman>「ありがとう…… <pc>ちゃん……！| この試練を 乗りこ: <if_woman>Thanks... <pc>! If I get|through this ordeal... I'm gonna be a very|wise man. I can be... Right?<else>Thanks... <pc>...! If I get|through this ordeal... I'll be the wisest|man alive. I can become... Right?<endif>

3.<if_woman>「シェリル……。私なら…大丈夫……。| それよりも…今 <p: <if_woman>Cheryl. I can... I'll be fine. More|importantly... Now that <pc>|said she'd fight with me.<else>Cheryl. I can... I'll be fine. More|importantly... <pc> said he'll|fight with me now.<endif>

4.「行こう カルサドラ火山へ……。| 呪いなんか さっさと おさらばして| もとの: Let's go to Calzadora volcano. Let's get rid|of this curse and get back to the way we|were.

6.「<pc> それでは よろしく頼む。| われらの決戦の地 カルサドラ火山の入口は:
Okay, good. The entrance|to the volcano Calzadora, the site of our|decisive battle, is in the southeastern part|
|of the Goble Desert east of...

7.「火山に入ったら 第１層を道なりに進み| 南側の空洞に行ってくれ。私は 術の準備:
Once you enter the volcano, follow the path|on the first level to the cavity on the|south side. I'll be heading there ahead of|
|you to prepare for the surgery.

8.「……心の闇に目をつけた 呪いの主は| 狡猾で残忍な 強敵に ちがいない。| く:
... The master of the curse, who has turned|his eye to the darkness in our hearts, is a|cunning, cruel, and formidable enemy. Come|
|with caution.

9.「アーニアは 私が カルサドラ火山まで| 連れていくから 心配いらん。| キミは: I'll take Arnia to the volcano Calzadora,|don't worry. You're just focused on|defeating the enemy.

10.「アーニアと シェリル……。| ふたりの 最後の戦いだ……！| 頼むぞ <pc>: Arnia and Cheryl. It's their last fight.|<pc>!

14.「ここへ着くなり アーニアが豹変してな。| いよいよ 本当に 限界が来たらしい…: As soon as we got here, Arnia changed. It|seems she's really reached her limit.

15.「シェリルッ！！ <cs_pchero>が 来たぞ！| 時間がない！ 早く 術を: Cheryl!!!! <cs_pchero> is here! We're|running out of time! Quickly, mesmerize me!

16.「アーニア 見ていてくれ……。| 私の手で この呪われた運命に| 終止符を打つ…: Arnia, watch me. With my own hands, I will|put an end to this accursed fate.

20.「なっ……！ そんな…… 術が効かない！？| なぜだ！ 私では ダメなのか！？: What the...! Oh, no... The technique doesn't|work! Why? ! I'm not good enough?

21.<center>ムハハハハハッ……。無駄だ 小娘。|貴様程度の魔力では アーニア: Mwahahahahahaha. It's no use. You're not|strong enough to pull me out of Arnia's|heart.

22.「まさか 呪いの主が……！？: No way, the master of the curse...!

23.<center>いかにも……。完全なる支配まで あとわずか。|さあ 余に聞かせよ:
How so? So close to total domination. Now|listen to me. I hear the cries of agony as|my fallen friend is slaughtered by the Dark|
|Sage!

24.「ゥ…ウウ……。| ……シェ…リ…ル……。| もういちど…… 術を…使って……。: Uh... Uu... ... She... Li... Le... Let's try|again... ...the art of... Use...

26.<center>むぅ……？ アーニアめ こしゃくな……。|まだ 余に 逆らうか…: Hmm...? Arnia, you're being naughty. Still|defying me?

27.「かろうじて ヤツを…おさえているわ……。| これが ラストチャンスよ……。|: I barely got him... I've got him. This is|our last chance. Come on, one more time...|Do it again.

28.「ダメだ……。私の術なんて 無駄だ！| きっと また 失敗するに決まっている！|: No. My jutsu is useless! I'm sure I'll fail|again! I'm... I'm helpless!

29.「ううん シェリル……。| あなたは 無力なんかじゃない……。| それに……: No, Cheryl. You're not helpless. And...

30.「私のことも もうちょっと| 頼りにしてほしいな……。: I wish you could rely on me a little more.

35.「チィィッ ぬかったわ！| アーニアに まだ こんなチカラが| 残っていようとは: You got me! I didn't think Arnia still had|this kind of power!

36.「貴様が 呪いの主か……！: You are the master of the curse.

37.「ムハハハハハ……。いかにも……。| 余は 魔賢者アクバー……。| この世に姿を: Mwahahahahahaha. Indeed. I am Akbar the|Witch Wise. I've only been in this world for|a few hundred years.

38.「なぜ アーニアに とりついた！？| 貴様の目的は なんだ！: Why did you haunt Arnia? What is your|purpose?

39.「ムァハハハ……。余に とりつかれ| 狂気の世界に堕ちた 闇賢者たちは| 余の: Mwahahahaha. The dark wisemen who are|possessed by me and have fallen into madness|are my faithful servants.

40.「そうして 世界中の賢者を 闇賢者に変え| 余の支配する世界を 創造するのだ！|: Then I will turn all the wise men of the|world into Dark Sages and create a world|that I will rule! That is my ambition!

41.「アーニアは 最高の駒になるはずだった……。| 今まで 闇賢者に堕ちた者を はる: Arnia was going to be the best pawn. Or did|she possess a hidden power far greater than|those who have fallen to the Dark Sage?

42.「アーニアを 闇賢者にすれば| 野望の成就に さらに近づいたというに……！| シ: If only Arnia had been made a Dark Sage, she|would have been even closer to fulfilling|her ambition! Cheryl... Because of you...!

43.「ムァーハッハッハ！ だがな……| じつは アーニアよりも 優れた駒を| すでに: Mwahahaha! But... But the truth is, I've|already found a better piece than Arnia.

45.「シェリルと アーニアに宿っていたときから| その秘めたるチカラに 目をつけてお: I've had my eye on Cheryl and Arnia ever|since I saw their hidden power. You will be|the darkest of the dark wizards.

46.「さあ！ 余に その心をよこせ！| 闇賢者へと 身を堕とし 余の腹心として| 仕: Come on! Give me your heart! You may be|proud to have degraded yourself to the Dark|Sage, and to serve as my liege!

47.「ムハハハハ……。なかなかやるな シェリル。| だが そろそろ 貴様の相手も飽い: Mwahahahaha. You're good, Sh. But I'm|getting tired of dealing with you. I'll let|you go.

50.「ムハーッハッハ！ 取り逃がしたかと思ったら| 貴様のほうから のこのこ やって: Mwahaha! Just when I thought I'd lost you,|you come along on your own! Good, good,|good! That's what I'm talking about!

51.「さあ！ 余に その心をよこせ！| 闇賢者へと 身を堕とし 余の腹心として| 仕: Come on! Give me your heart! You may be|proud to have degraded yourself to the Dark|Sage, and to serve as my liege!

52.「なん…だと……？ 余…が 敗北……？| 世界…創…造の……野望…が……。| ゥ: What the... What...? I... Defeated...? The|world... Creation... Creation... Ambition...|. is... ... Aaaaah!

54.「終わった……。| 私たちの戦いが ついに……。: It's over. Our fight is finally over.

57.「す…すまない……。| 感謝の気持ちで いっぱいなのだが……。: I'm sorry... I'm sorry. I'm so grateful.

58.「私は アーニアと ちがって| こんなとき なんて言葉をかけていいか| わからな: Unlike Arnia, I don't know what to say at a|time like this.

59.「とりあえず…… ありがとう。| ……で いいだろうか？: For now... Yes. ... Is that okay?

60.「アーニアなら ティーザさんに連れられ| ひと足先に 研究院に戻ったよ。| チカ: Arnia would've been taken by Miss Tisa back|to the institute. She was exhausted. She was|in danger.

61.「……思えば| アーニアの呪いを 引き受けたときから| 私は 愚かな行為を繰り返: ... I have been repeating my foolish acts|ever since I took on the curse of Arnia.

62.「おのれを過信し 誰の言葉にも 耳を貸さず| あまつさえ…… ただひとりの親友す: He was overconfident, he didn't listen to|anyone, he didn't even... He didn't even|trust his only friend.

64.「あまたの愚かしさの先に| まことの賢なる道が ひらかれていると……。: Beyond all the foolishness, the true and|wise path is open.

65.「アーニアは 知っていたのかもしれないな。| その 愚かしさを越えるには| 信じ: Maybe Arnia knew. Maybe Arnia knew that to|overcome her stupidity, she needed a friend|she could trust.

66.「……アーニアのことが 心配だ。| すまないが 先に 研究院に戻っている。| <: ... Arniea... I'm sorry, I have to get back|to the lab. I'll get the <cs_pchero>|later.

67.「<cs_pchero>……。私は 幸せだ。| こんな私を 待っていてくれる人が: <cs_pchero>.I am . I have someone|waiting for me.

69.「シェリルから 聞いたよ！| 呪いの主を やっつけてくれたんだってね！| 私 そ: Cheryl told me about you! I heard you killed|the master of the curse! I feel so much|better after hearing that!

70.<if_woman>「やっぱり <pc>ちゃんは スゴイよ！| ホントに ホント: <if_woman> <pc> is awesome! Really,|really, really! I'm so glad I found you!<else> <pc> is awesome! Really,|really, really! I'm so glad I met you!<endif>

72.「今しがた 緊急で 研究院会議が開かれてな。| 魔賢者アクバーの存在と それを討:
There was an emergency meeting of the|institute just now. They discussed the|existence of Akbar the Witch Wise and your|
|success in defeating him.

73.「賢者の未来を おびやかす 魔賢者アクバーを| 見事 打ち滅ぼした キミの功績を: The future of the wise men is in jeopardy| You've done a magnificent job of destroying it, and I commend you

75.「本来なら 国を挙げ 式典を開くところだが| 忙しいキミの身を案じ 私が授与を命: I would have held a state ceremony, but|you're a busy man, so I'm going to do you|the favor. Go on, take it!

76.「王立研究院から 特別に贈られた| この報酬を 受け取ってくれ。: I received this reward as a special gift|from the Royal Academy of Sciences.

78.「だが 賢なる道の扉は 開かれたばかりだ。| これに おごることなく 宇宙の理を:
But the door to the path of wisdom is open.|Do not be deceived by this... but pursue the|truth of the universe... and train yourself|
|to be a wise man.

79.「ねえ シェリル……？| あなた 研究院に戻ってくるんでしょ？| また 一緒に勉: Hey, Cheryl...? You're coming back to the|institute, right? We can study together|again!

80.「いや……。| 私は ここに戻るつもりはない。: No. I'm going to come back here.

81.「そんな……！ どうしてっ！？| 一緒に 大賢者になるんじゃなかったの？| まだ: Oh, no...! What are you doing? I thought we|were going to become the Great Sage|together. What are you still thinking about?

82.「ふっ。カン違いするな。| 大賢者になる夢を あきらめたつもりはない。| 私は: Huh. Wrong guess. I thought I'd given up on|my dream of becoming the wisest man alive. I|just...

83.「研究院の中と外で 別々のものを学びとり| それを 互いに教え合っていくのが|:
I believe that learning different things|inside and outside the institute, and|teaching them to each other, is a shortcut|
|to becoming a great sage.

84.「ふたりなら できる…… だろ？: You two can do it. Right?

86.「そうだね。今の私たちなら 離れてたって| 同じ夢を 見られるはずだもん！: So. We can have the same dream even if we're|far away from each other!

87.「それでは 私は 行くよ。| またな アーニア……。: Well, then, I'll . See you later, Arnia.

88.「<pc>も……| また どこかで出会えると いいな。: <pc> is also... I'm sure we'll|run into each other again somewhere .
